section.para: To add a new Standard Journal to a Standard Journal Group, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Add New Standard Journal Group Item

section.para: When adding a Standard Journal to a Standard Journal Group, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Standard Journal you want to add to the Journal Group.
Indicates date when Journal becomes an effective member of the Journal Group.
Indicates date when Journal expires from the Journal Group.

varlistentry.term: May be Applied any Amount of Times

listitem.para: Select if Standard Journal may be applied any amount of times.
Select if Standard Journal may be applied only a set amount of times.
Specify the maximum number of times the Standard Journal may be applied.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without adding a new Journal to the Journal Group, returning you to the previous screen.
Adds the Journal to the Journal Group, using the specified parameters.
